div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1643 Memphis, 1920 Burial: c. 480 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 4 AR Mantineia: 1 triob. (as BMC 1) Teos: 1 triob. (as Balcer, SNR 1968, no. 53) Paphus: 1 tetrob. (type of BMC 4) Cyprus: 1 tetrob. (type of Trait√©, pl. 27, 14) Disposition: London Information from G. K. Jenkins Coins pierced, originally attached to neck- lace found during excavations by Petrie
